Reviews.Title: “this is why you have to book your hotel in good time ;)”
Reviews.Author: 39Juli
Reviews.Content: boyfriend bad stay hotel due bad cleaning hotel accused broken window window broke tried receptionist guy called owner hotel telephone receptionist owner note window couldnâ€™t shouldnâ€™t direction pay broken window luckily boyfriend kept calm situation note window supposed window air circulation afterwards boyfriend speak owner reception speak phone conversation owner implied removed note window probably regretted boyfriend family lawyer probably agree hadnâ€™t fuss owner forced pay window couldnâ€™t sleep window day receptionist cleaning lady allowed window looked confused night couldnâ€™t window guy yesterday forgotten tell dirty greasy hotel sticky fingers touching hotel fat carpet floor filled dust window broken dusty none bed lamps light bulbs sink blocked lamp light bulb wouldnâ€™t recommend hotel unless low standards sleep prepared stand yourself hotel literally falling apart owner pay stuff brakes nice hotels amsterdam book time â€“ book late bad expensive hotels left mistake

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic value for money!”
Reviews.Author: Sneckweck
Reviews.Content: boyfriend booked hotel reasonable price january dissatisfied booked double bedroom shared bathroom expecting price pleasantly surprised arrived found shower balcony extra cost bed comfortable size breakfast morning found satisfactory location

Reviews.Title: “Not that bad”
Reviews.Author: jj83_11
Reviews.Content: hotel super cheap location pretty low standards anyway didnt disappoint clean functional lot street noise trams running outside stayed 19 top floor meant treacherous vertical climb stairs suitcase lift major issues fire alternative escape thankfully didnt bug issues else breakfast ok pay key spend time hotel visit

Reviews.Title: “Cheap, clean, easy to find”
Reviews.Author: bxrry
Reviews.Content: stayed 4 bed dorm 2 fairly clean beds comfy criticism noisy lot noise traffic trams reception wall phone door buzzer people chatting restaurant road close vondelpark easy trams line 1

Reviews.Title: “Good times, destroyed a bit by lack of hot water”
Reviews.Author: y4hoo
Reviews.Content: paid cheap hotel close amenities single beds fit gf tho definitely biggest advantage hotel friendly excellent staff love marco lack hot water 48hrs hols showers floor cleaned daily recommend taking flip flops anyway

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic stay”
Reviews.Author: stars1989
Reviews.Content: im impressed hotel princess location staff safe warm winter shared dorm simple sufficient breakfast cleaned daily wifi free own device noisy street trams occassional deafening siren emergency services downside annoying met fantastic lovely people recommend friends plan stay soon

Reviews.Title: “cheap and fab location”
Reviews.Author: ZainyZoe
Reviews.Content: found hotel reasonable price comfortable star hotel staff friendly happy check earlier usual check time arrived breakfast basic sufficient seeing included price payed

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable & Friendly”
Reviews.Author: flamidwyfe
Reviews.Content: 2nd stay hotel princess stayed adult son aug 2009 enjoyed location staff booked stay march 2010 read reviews encountered rude staff staff encountered friendly helpful professional stays cleaned day total 4 time 5 stay travel am visiting hang hotel beds clean comfortable change teensy bit leg 3rd floor toilet knees door bit tight clean showers hot water feels day walking town continental breakfast morning fine 23 kinds meat cheese white brown bread juice cereal hot beverages machine free folks idea people complaining additionally free wireless internet youve brought laptop 3g phone getting reception iphone 2 computers downstairs 2 euros hour cheap affordable definitely recommend hotelhostel stay

Reviews.Title: “Rude Rude Rude!!”
Reviews.Author: balnagask44
Reviews.Content: price accommodation resonable expect basic expect treated common human decency available hotel hostel staff fine staff particular rude obnoxious beyond belief extent confront behaviour changed attitude friendly advise travellers staying tolerate behaviour

HotelInfo.Address: Overtoom 80, Amsterdam 1054, The Netherlands
